reviews.name: Samsung UN55HU6950FXZA 55" 4k Ultra HD Class LED HDTV
reviews.reviewText: This TV is beyond anything I expected. I've just begun to explore all the functions and it's a wonderful journey. The picture is "exquisite!" It takes your breath away and the options are endless. Love it, love it, love it!
reviews.title: Prepare to be "blown-away!"

reviews.name: Samsung UN55HU6950FXZA 55" 4k Ultra HD Class LED HDTV
reviews.reviewText: This is the best television that I have owned in my life time. has a great picture and sound system. Avery good looking and has an expensive look it it. I am very happy with it
reviews.title: Beautiful picture and a very nice T V.

reviews.name: Samsung UN55HU6950FXZA 55" 4k Ultra HD Class LED HDTV
reviews.reviewText: the picture on this tv is outstanding. only thing is I cannot change channels with the small remote you get. I can control volume and all other items, but must use cable controller to change channels. on line help- no help.
reviews.title: great tv.

reviews.name: Samsung UN55HU6950FXZA 55" 4k Ultra HD Class LED HDTV
reviews.reviewText: Good so Far try Netflix for 4K content.
reviews.title: Solid UHD TV for Money

reviews.name: Samsung UN55HU6950FXZA 55" 4k Ultra HD Class LED HDTV
reviews.reviewText: So easy to hook up. Even I could do it. Very easy to use with dish remote almost set it's self up. The picture is like you are sanding in the middle of the picture when are watching it .
reviews.title: New TV
